name: Life in Death (Prototype)
description:
This game was created for Jame Gam #23

You play as the spirit of a man who wishes to live again. You solve puzzles by interacting with objects to complete the game.

Controls: WASD to move, E to interact.

(If you can't move, make sure you're not leaving your body behind) 

This is just a prototype / proof of concept. There is only one puzzle to solve. I've left a hint below in case you struggle.

Created using the Godot Engine.

########Puzzle Hint########

There is a skull you can interact with in the bottom right corner ;)
